g++  -fPIC -std=c++11 -march=native -O3 -O3 -DNDEBUG  -shared -Wl,-soname,libmyslam.so -o ../../lib/libmyslam.so CMakeFiles/myslam.dir/frame.cpp.o CMakeFiles/myslam.dir/mappoint.cpp.o CMakeFiles/myslam.dir/map.cpp.o CMakeFiles/myslam.dir/camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/myslam.dir/config.cpp.o CMakeFiles/myslam.dir/visual_odometry.cpp.o  -L/root/lib/opencv-3.0.0/cpu_release/lib -lopencv_core -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_calib3d -lopencv_video -lopencv_features2d -lopencv_ml -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_objdetect -lopencv_contrib -lopencv_legacy -lopencv_imgcodecs /data/code2/slambook/3rdparty/Sophus/build/libSophus.so -lg2o_core -lg2o_stuff -lg2o_types_sba -Wl,-rpath,/root/lib/opencv-3.0.0/cpu_release/lib:/data/code2/slambook/3rdparty/Sophus/build
